DOC.criteria: Participants least one parent least one child age 3 5 year . Families reside great Victoria , British Columbia . Parents single parent coparents ( i.e . require one parent one child participate ) . Families include least one parent participate one child age 3 5 meeting current physical activity guideline ( > =60 minute day moderate vigorous physical activity .
